Muhammed Khalid is a Civil Engineer. He joined the University in 1980 as lecturer in Civil/Structural Engineering and has been actively involved in curriculum development
column3: research and various admin duties within the department. He has taken up industrial secondments in Scotland and academic secondments in Finland and Malaysia.

column1: He joined the University's Business Development Team a couple of years ago and is responsible of promoting the University overseas.
Muhammed Khalid has been actively involved in voluntary work in the areas of community relations and racial equality and is a bench serving Justice of the Peace in Dundee.
